CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The full width at half - maximum ( fwhm ) of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) film is 324 nm , which is nearly a double that of P3HT film ( 158 nm ).

Let's think step by step.

Sure! The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. PDTP-DTDPP(Bu)
2. P3HT

So, the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are the names of two different materials, PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) and P3HT, which are being compared in terms of their full width at half-maximum (fwhm).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here's the updated list of "Material Name" entities in the paragraph after removing irrelevant entities:

1. PDTP-DTDPP(Bu)
2. P3HT

These are the two materials being compared in the paragraph, and their names are clearly mentioned as "PDTP-DTDPP(Bu)" and "P3HT".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's a Markdown table with the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) |
| P3HT |

The table has one column, "Material Name", and two rows, each containing one of the valid material names mentioned in the paragraph. The material names are presented in the same words as in the original paragraph.
